entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as a person who would lose her job at the Ministry if she started speaking out. She is also mentioned as someone who has been convinced to be a spy inside the Ministry.

entities.name: arthur
entities.description: Arthur is mentioned as a person who would lose his job at the Ministry if he started speaking out.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as a person who is explaining why it's important to have spies inside the Ministry. He also mentions that Tonks and Arthur would lose their jobs if they spoke out.

entities.name: volde-mort
entities.description: Volde-mort is mentioned as someone who will likely have spies inside the Ministry.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as someone who has managed to convince a couple of people to be spies inside the Ministry.

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt is mentioned as someone who has been a real asset and is in charge of the hunt for Sirius. He's also feeding the Ministry information that Sirius is in Tibet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is asking questions about why Dumbledore is in trouble.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as someone who explains that they're trying to discredit Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who is in trouble and being discredited.

relationships.description: Sirius mentions that Volde-mort will have spies inside the Ministry.
Mr. Weasley has convinced Tonks to be a spy inside the Ministry.
Kingsley Shacklebolt is in charge of the hunt for Sirius and feeding the Ministry information that Sirius is in Tibet.
Lupin explains that they're trying to discredit Dumbledore.
